title: r/Maliciouscompliance "YOU'RE IN AMERICA, SPEAK AMERICAN!" [speaks Native American]
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP gets tired of entitled Karens telling him to speak American when he's in America. So, he visits the local Native American tribe and asks them to teach him how to respond in their native tongue. Turns out that those racists weren't prepared for that malicious compliance! If you like this video, subscribe for more daily Reddit posts!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
